Articles.Content: Can you Start a Modular space station (Stock) with the Saturn-shuttle?

Can you Start a Modular space station (Stock) with the Saturn-shuttle?

He just launched the core recently.

Can you Start a Modular space station (Stock) with the Saturn-shuttle?

Already underway! However, there is a voting ongoing as to whether or not I should use TAC Life Support alongside with my game. You can vote if you want.
If you do use it...you might consider kerbal alarm clock to mark when you need to send a resupply mission.

If you do use it...you might consider kerbal alarm clock to mark when you need to send a resupply mission.

Good idea! I'll probably add other mods. I'll start looking around.
Alright! SSM-10 is complete. So I'll move onto the next guy's probe!

Awesome!! Feel free to add to my story . Voyager is.

I have an idea! why don't we pass the save or persistance file around so it can be like there is more than one company assisting each other? Just a thought!

I have an idea! why don't we pass the save or persistance file around so it can be like there is more than one company assisting each other? Just a thought!

Again, possible. But let's see if there's enough people who say they will participate. I (no offense) don't want to run it if only 2 people (please know I mean no offense!) will use it. Get people to say they'd participate and I will .
That's fair and understandable! I normally do not share my saves if I can avoid it (this is because they are heavily modded)
Do you guys mind if I rip-off the idea for this thread create a thread with a similar premise and purpose, except using the shuttle I currently have in development?

Do you guys mind if I rip-off the idea for this thread create a thread with a similar premise and purpose, except using the shuttle I currently have in development?

I guess... But in that thread at least say you got the idea from here (link this thread). I mean there's no fault in being inspired by a thread to make another, just admit it and give credit where it's due.

- - - Updated - - -

That's fair and understandable! I normally do not share my saves if I can avoid it (this is because they are heavily modded)

I've got mods here, but none are part mods (only "part mod" is AsteriodDay but that isn't a mod, it's a DLC) so sharing the save should be easy, just a pain.
Come on man!! Why is all foreign payloads buggy?? Splittin in half, probe core 30m up and 30m to the side. Jeez KSP. FIX YERSELF.

Here is the Probe. I think that I might have forgotten action group 1 for the main dish.

Alright.

Btw- PSA, I'm pausing this REALLY SHORTLY as I ask around and try to find the cause behind this mysterious subassembly bug. Once fixed I'll launch SSM-11 and your probe is selected for SSM-13.
Oooh! Lucky 13!

Oooh! Lucky 13!

Wasn't for Apollo 13 XD .

Come on man!! Why is all foreign payloads buggy?? Splittin in half, probe core 30m up and 30m to the side. Jeez KSP. FIX YERSELF.

Hope that wasn't mine...

Hope that wasn't mine...

No it's the VK-1. But it happened on Voyager's probe too.

No it's the VK-1. But it happened on Voyager's probe too.

Ok, say, just out of curiosity, but when is our payload planned to go up?
Whenever I get an answer and solution to this problem.
Love the shuttle missions! I may or may not give the Saturn Shuttle a mission soon, SAP-C would love to help with the funding of this program.

Love the shuttle missions! I may or may not give the Saturn Shuttle a mission soon, SAP-C would love to help with the funding of this program.

Thank you so much!! that means a lot, really. l will be honest, it feels that I'm running these missions for 3 people XD , but hearing so many people who like this and who are willing to send in crafts is awesome! Thank you guys so much!! Also, I will launch whatever you send as soon as there's an opening . Lastly I have a bit of a surprise being made for you guys, but I need time for it to be finished so keep coming back to check!! . :D
Yeah, when i havebmore time, i'm thinking of making a similar thing to this only using normal chemical rockets.

Yeah, when i havebmore time, i'm thinking of making a similar thing to this only using normal chemical rockets.

And my SS isn't a chemical rocket? What's LF/aid then? XD unless you mean your going to be using RealFuels.

I meant to say, no shuttle involved! Unmanned launches with the occassional capsule launch.
